Description:
Better Living at AMAZING Value!
The magnificent Porter Davis design "Hampshire" doesn't compromise on style or functionality.
Instead, it offers an exceptional home that offers all you need for the growing family. There are four bedrooms, two bathrooms as well as plenty of living space including a large rumpus at the rear of the house, joining to the kitchen, here's the dining and family area for comfortable ease and use.
- Modern kitchen with large walk-in pantry
- 20mm Stone Benchtop, 900mm S/S Cooktop and range-hood
- Open plan living area with separate rumpus room
- Spacious master bedroom with his & her walk-in robes
- Luxury turn-key inclusions including ducted heating and security alarm
- Front landscaping and driveway included
- Double garage with internal access
- Located in Botanical - Mickleham's newest master-planned community
- Land size: 420m2
- House size: 24.70sq approx
- MOVE-IN READY!
Purchase a brand new Porter Davis home Today, rest easy knowing all you have to do is move.
Plus, first home buyer, are eligible for the $10,000 first home buyer grant and NO STAMP DUTY under the value of 600k.
Please note we have more properties available across Mickleham, Craigieburn & Kalkallo, simply send an email inquiry for a full list and to arrange an inspection.
Porter Davis, industry-leading after-sales service, rest easy knowing their New Home Care Team are just a phone call away.

Description:
Perfect Start or Perfect Investment...
Be quick to inspect this charming home offering gorgeous street appeal with loads of character and style. Well equipped with many upgrades to impress first home buyers or even the savviest of investors.
Showcasing 4 spacious bedrooms, master with private ensuite & walk-in robe. Additional 3 bedrooms all with built-in robes, serviced by centralised stylish bathroom & separate toilet.
Open-plan living/meals area in the heart of the home, impressive kitchen with stone benchtop & stainless steel appliances with ample storage space. Step outside to the low maintenance backyard with the perfect entertaining zone for guests or the perfect area for the kids to play.
Additional features include the comforts of ducted heating & split system air conditioning, new carpet throughout, double car garage with internal access plus more!
Suitably positioned in the heart of Craigieburn, within walking distance to public transport and only a short drive to reputable schools &, local shops and much more. Inspection is a must!
Call us today!
Shikha Vaid 0414 689 144
Preet Brar 0416 085 144

Description:
Mt Ridley Living.
With an abundance of natural light, spacious living and ample accommodation, this outstanding residence offers plenty of room for the growing family. From the moment you step inside you will appreciate the flexible floor plan that allows the family to interact yet provides space for those who appreciate their privacy. Perfect for those who like to entertain all year round, you will be the envy of all your friends complete with stunning enclosed alfresco area. Comprising of ducted heating, reverse cycle air conditioning, formal lounge & formal dining, open plan kitchen meals family area, granite bench tops and sink, high quality European cooking appliances, dish drawers, oversized study/optional 5th bedroom, large upstairs rumpus room/teenagers' retreat, parents' retreat, large bedrooms with built in robes & master bedroom offering full ensuite with double vanity, corner spa and large walk in robe, double remote garage and much more. All situated in the ever popular Mount Ridley Estate with all the amenities close by including the Stockland shopping centre, public transport, local schools, MCG sized football oval (Highgate Reserve) and surrounded by parkland. This home really is the complete package, be quick to inspect as it won't hang around for long. Mid week inspections are also available via appointment, if you can not attend one of our advertised open for inspections please don't hesitate to contact us to arrange a viewing.

Description:
Inspection by appointment only
MAJESTIC HILLTOP HOME
Defined by the strong street presence, a supremely spacious floor plan and superb outlook, this split level architecturally designed home have instantly appealing facade. Along with Huge terrace overlooking a panoramic city view. Set on a large allotment measuring 827sqm (approx), it appeals to the large family looking for a spacious home in a premium and sought-after location.
Designed with an emphasis on space & style, this well-built home offers multiple living zones throughout that include formal and informal living areas.
Ground floor offering a grand entry leading to the formal lounge room and study room, large ultra-modern kitchen with cathedral ceilings overlooking to the dining room and living area with access to the huge balcony, a total of 5 bedrooms (main bedroom overlooking Melbourne CBD, luxurious ensuite and custom-built WIR) and modern central bathroom.
Solid timber modern staircase leading to the lower floor, second dream size kitchen with 900mm appliances, stone benchtops and butler pantry, large meals area, generous family room with feature gas jet master heater, separate rumpus room with built-in bar area, fully furbished theatre room, 3rd bathroom and roomy laundry. Double garage with internal access, enclosed alfresco with built-in BBQ/kitchenette overlooking the large backyard with fishpond.
The home also has side access and huge under-house double brick storage room with a remote-controlled door.
Features and fitting include: Ducted heating, x2 refrigerated cooling throughout, cathedral high ceilings, quality vacuum maid, alarm system, x2 audio visual intercom, laundry shoot, 40 panels solar system, theatre system, x2 dishwasher, parquetry, floorboard & porcelain tiles flooring, modern light fittings, chandelier, expensive window furnishings and list goes on...
Inspection highly recommended...
Internal area

Description:
Glamorous Family Living in Mt Ridley On 790m2 (approx.)
Strikingly beautiful and luxurious in every sense, welcome to a refined sense of living with this exquisite family residence. Enjoyed and meticulously maintained, this beautifully presented family home is set in one of the area's most desirable pockets and ready to be loved by a new family.
Greeted by an oversized spacious formal lounge, separate study or 4th bedroom, through to a large and well-appointed kitchen with stone benchtops, stainless steel 900ml appliances, overlooking the meals/living zone with access to the outdoor entertaining area leading out to one of the largest backyards ever seen in Craigieburn perfect for the kids to play until their hearts content.
The home is complete with solid hardwood timber flooring throughout, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, two split systems, master bedroom equipped with ensuite & walk in robe. In addition, on offer are 2 extra-large bedrooms with build in robes & main central bathroom. Double garage featuring internal & drive through access plus much more. Don't hold off inspecting this one!!

Description:
Build Your Dream Home in Mt Aitkin!
Titled and ready to build this impressive allotment measuring 535m2 approx is located in "Beautiful Mt Aitkin" one of the most sought after pocket in Craigieburn and with easy access to Aitkin BLVD and close proximity to Craigieburn Central, parklands and all other major amenities.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
18 Hollyhock Road, Craigieburn - East Facing Brand New Home
(PLEASE USE WWW.WHEREIS.COM OR APPLE IPHONE MAPS TO FIND THE ADDRESS)
Ticks all the buyer's wish list
1. Land size - 350 sqm
2. 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms & double garage
3. Approx 15 mins walk to Newbury Primary School & community centre
4. Approx 2.6 kms to Highlands Shopping Centre
5. Approx 12 mins to Craigieburn Train Station
6. Bus stop to Craigieburn train station at 800m walk
7. Plus, if you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG!!
Only 5% to secure the property and balance on settlement!!
Mike Sarupria presents 18 Hollyhock Road, Craigieburn (CURRENTLY UNDER CONSTRUCTION AND COMPLETION BY MARCH 2020) in the prestigious Highlands estate & only a short drive to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Highlands Shopping Centre & schools. Photos are from previous similar property.
This brand new home comes equipped with luxury turn-key inclusions such as professionally styled interior colour themes, stone bench tops, carpets, tiles, higher ceilings and much more. Front landscaping, driveway and quality flooring are also all included in this beautiful home.
18 Hollyhock Road Features:
- 4 spacious bedrooms, master will full double vanity ensuite and walk in robe remaining 3 bedrooms with built in robes.
- Well-equipped kitchen & stainless steel cooking appliances including 900 mm gas cook top, range hood, dishwasher, walk in pantry and island bench.
- Open plan living space comprising spacious dining and living area adjacent kitchen.
- Modern central bathroom.
- Spacious laundry
- Central ducted heating and provisions for evaporative cooling
- Concrete perimeter around the house and security alarm
- Remote control double car garage and much more!
Call Mike on 0430 126 491 or Frank on 0426 425 361 now for further information or to arrange an inspection.
Photo ID must be presented upon all open & private inspections.

Description:
A FLAWLESS EX-DISPLAY BURSTING WITH ADDED EXTRAS!
A lifestyle of complete luxury, comfort & convenience is assured to the lucky buyer with this stunning ex-display home. Boasting a simple yet practical floor plan, this well-designed home boasts a smooth integration between the stunning kitchen domain through to the family meals/family area with 2 outdoor entertaining zones to give the home a free-flowing feel & providing the very best in family entertainment.
A flexible sun-drenched floor plan offering 4 massive bedrooms, huge walk-in robe & deluxe ensuite to a large master bedroom, 3 spacious zones with separate formal lounge, super-sized meals & family area with massive ceiling heights will perfect for large scale family gatherings & a casual rumpus for everyday relaxing, fully equipped kitchen with great storage, butlers pantry, 900mm stainless steel appliances & ample Ceasar stone bench space.
Step outside & be pleasantly surprised by the home's showpiece outdoor zones, equipped with a brand new built-in BBQ & cosy gas log fireplace which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor & outdoor integration. It also provides a safe low maintenance haven for kids to play until their heart's content in complete privacy.
Located to perfection with uninterrupted nature views, a short stroll a fantastic local park, within seconds to proposed shopping Centre, schools & transport & jam-packed with quality extras including super high ceilings, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, professionally landscaped gardens front & back, double remote garage, great storage throughout, roomy laundry, alarm, sparkling central bathroom & much much more!
Homes like this do not come up often, so call now & be the proud new owner of this sensational offering.

Description:
Immediate Appeal with Corner Block Credentials
In an established Craigieburn neighbourhood with easy access to the area's key lifestyle
attractions, this single-level home occupies an impressively large corner block (approx 650m2) providing a family lifestyle of immediate comfort along with exceptional future development potential (STCA).
Well-presented throughout, the home's light and bright interior comprises a large master
bedroom with built-in robes, 2 additional bedrooms, central bathroom & separate WC, along
with an open lounge/dining area & contemporary-style kitchen.
Add to this a full-size laundry, gas heating & split-system air conditioning, plus a private
backyard area with secure double carport (via Midhurst Court) & huge front garden
highlighting the property's generous dimensions & untapped potential.
Local reserves & Wilmott Park Primary School all within easy walking distance, it's also close to a choice of bus routes, Malcolm Creek trails, Craigieburn Golf Course & Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre.

Description:
An Outstanding Ex-Display of Style & Quality
Situated in the very heart of Merrifield, moments from Pinnacle Park & The Corner Store, this extraordinary Nostra-built home is sure to exceed all expectations with its outstanding design, premium upgrades throughout & landscaped gardens all-round.
Occupying one of the area's larger allotments (approx 571sqm), the home's opulent interior
boasts a grand entrance hallway with towering ceilings, 4 bedrooms (large master bedroom with walk-in robe), study with built-in workstation, deluxe ensuite & main family bathroom - both with stone-top vanities & floor-to-ceiling tiles.
Multiple living zones include a dedicated theatre room with tiered flooring & integrated
surround sound speakers, versatile rumpus area & expansive open-plan family/dining spaces
complemented by a superb Blanco-equipped kitchen with stone benchtops & splashbacks,
soft-close drawers & large walk-in pantry.
Along with ducted heating & evaporative cooling, the home also boasts a 5.5kW solar power
system & solar/gas hot water, alarm, quality carpets & floor tiles, large laundry & excellent storage options.
Bi-folds reveal a fabulous al-fresco entertaining deck complete with cafe blinds, lush gardens & high fences all-round, plus the added appeal of a remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Expansive green spaces, sports facilities, vibrant retail & dining precincts, future primary & secondary schools highlight the scope of the Merrifield's comprehensive masterplan, along with easy access to Donnybrook Station & the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Pure Serenity Living
Location, Location, Location! Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented home offering gorgeous street appeal being adjacent 'Serenity Park' and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character for all home buyers alike.
Offering fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances including 900mm cooktop, main bathroom, HUGE master bedroom with built in robe and ensuite, open plan meals area with adjoining family room, double garage with internal access and roller door external access. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight, complete with under cover alfresco & surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens plus side gate access.
A host of extras include high ceilings, ducted heating & split system cooling, beautifully maintained carefree gardens and more. All this offering a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & close to parkland. With all the amenities close by including a short stroll to Highlands Lake, Aitken Creek, Craigieburn Central shopping centre, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!
*** COVID-19 Private property inspection rules ***
If you're attending a private inspection, you must only attend if you are fit and healthy to do so, have no reason to think that you have been contaminated and are not under any self-isolation conditions. There is a maximum of two people allowed to attend and you must maintain social distancing requirements at all times. Please don't touch anything inside the property. If you would like to view something in particular, please request the agent's assistance. Presenting an opportunity to secure a well maintained home in a highly sought-after area. With an extensive amount of amenities available at your fingertips including Good Samaritan Primary School, proposed shopping centre, Roxburgh College, Roxburgh Park Primary School, Roxburgh Village shopping centre and train station.
An open-plan living area accompanied by an impressive kitchen and meals area is matched by the desirability of 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms featuring a main bedroom with an elegant ensuite confirm the family credentials
Remote controlled double lock up garage, ducted heating and air conditioner are among the extra attractions that further highlight the appeal of securing such a great home.
Whether you are a first home buyer, looking to downsize or looking to expand your investment portfolio in a prime location, this home is not one to be missed.
